sdapy.snerun.snobject.bin_lc¶

snobject.bin_lc(self, returnv=False, **kwargs)¶

Bin multiband LCs.

Parameters
bin_lc: `bool`

bin the lcs or not

tdbinfloat

threshold to be used to bin lcs (unit in days)

returnvbool

if return the LCs, or store them in the class

See also

snobject.bin_df, snobject.match_colors
